Rodrigues et al. synthesised carbohydrazide containing BTA derivatives and studied their antitumor activities against human prostate cancer cell lines. N′-formyl-2–(5-nitrothiophen-2-yl)benzothiazole-6-carbohydrazide 65 ( Figure 40) exhibited potent anticancer activity against PC-3 and LNCaP having IC 50 values 19.9 ± 1.17 and 11.2 ± 0.79 µg/m respectively
63 .
